CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing OracleFeed relative to Starburst Online?
SRP.A: OracleFeed is {below} Starburst Online in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaStream relative to Luminara?
SRP.A: NovaStream is {above} Luminara in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to OracleFeed?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {above} OracleFeed in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {OracleFeed}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {NovaStream}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is NovaStream's maximum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: NovaStream's maximum Platform Traffic is in {2009}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst Online's minimum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst Online's minimum Platform Traffic is in {1997}.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2009, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 1996 and 2007?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 1998 and 2009 was {higher} than between 1996 and 2007.

NC.Q: Was the total Platform Traffic in 2003 higher or lower than in 2009?
NC.A: The total platform traffic in 2003 was {lower} than in 2009.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 1999, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 2005 and 2006?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 1997 and 1999 was {lower} than between 2005 and 2006.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2000, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 1998 and 2006?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 1997 and 2000 was {lower} than between 1998 and 2006.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {OracleFeed} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst Online and Luminara first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst Online and Luminara first exchanged leading positions in {1999}.
